data.comment: Today's referee, Alexandre Boucaut, has blown to start the match.
Gerardo Arteaga puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 1, Junya Ito instrumental with a fine assist.
Genk's Patrik Hrosovsky has been booked in Genk.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Genk.
Michiel Jonckheere is replacing Habib Gueye for the away team.
Yani Van Den Bossche is replacing Gilles Dewaele for Kortrijk at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 77, At Luminus Arena, Julien De Sart has been yellow-carded for the away team.
It's now 2-0 in Genk as Theo Bongonda scores for Genk.
Kortrijk make their third substitution with Jovan Stojanovic replacing Julien De Sart.
In the minute 82, The home team replace Patrik Hrosovsky with Kristian Thorstvedt.
Eric Ocansey is booked for the away team.
Pierre Dwomoh is on a sub for Bryan Heynen for Genk.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
